meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ray Coshow Wes Hazard Lauren Kiehna Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7801.

td.p: Ray Coshow, a landscaper from Sacramento, California
Wes Hazard, a standup comic and storyteller from Stoughton, Massachusetts
Lauren Kiehna, a writer from Steeleville, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $31,601)

tr.td: MNEMONICS
POP CULTURE STUPID ANSWERS
PLACES
HOMOPHONES
A CONTROVERSIAL CATEGORY
A VANILLA CATEGORY

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Sarah of the Clue Crew presents an illustration of the visible spectrum.) Remember the mnemonic & you\'ll also remember that the visible spectrum ranges from red, at an upper wavelength of 700 nanometers, down to this color, at 400 nanometers')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Sarah of the Clue Crew presents an illustration of the visible spectrum.) Remember the mnemonic & you'll also remember that the visible spectrum ranges from red, at an upper wavelength of 700 nanometers, down to this color, at 400 nanometers

div.onmouseover:

WesWho is teddy Roosevelt

LaurenWho is Nixon?
$13,401
Harry Truman')
div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Of the presidents who served more than 4 years, but less than 2 full terms, he served the longest:
7 years, 9 months, 8 days')

tr.td: PRESIDENTS

Of the presidents who served more than 4 years, but less than 2 full terms, he served the longest:
7 years, 9 months, 8 days
Lauren
Wes
Ray
3rd place: $1,000
New champion: $14,400
2nd place: $2,000
Lauren
Wes
Ray

22 R
(including 2 DDs),
2 W
(including 1 DD)
